name: The Evidence
storyline:
Your phone rings - A crime has been committed! The police need your help, only you can solve the case.
Find and connect all the evidence to solve the case.

Look closely at the crime scenes and analyze any evidence you find. There are no hints - you have to come up with the solution on your own! Write down all the important things in your notebook, so you don't lose track.

Connect all the evidence and reconstruct what happened. Some murderers try to hide evidence from you - Use the flashlight to see the evidence even in the darkest corners.

You can interact with many things at the crime scene. But be careful, not every object is evidence, don't be misled. Trust your gut feeling to distinguish relevant objects from the others.
summary: In The Evidence you'll take over the role of a detective who has to search for evidence at crime scenes and identify the possible murderer. Use your sharp mind and find the connections to solve the case!
